lead_paragraph: DAHLKE--Rev. Robert W.,S.J., on July 18, 2016. Beloved brother of Jane Reichard, Fran Vargo, Rita Robertine, Mabel Dudley and Sheila Moore. Reposing at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, 515 E. Fordham Rd., Bronx, NY on Friday 3-5 and 7-8:30pm. Funeral Mass at Fordham University Church, Saturday, 10:30am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St., New York, NY 10028. For information, contact Farenga Bros., Inc., Directors (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DAHLKE, REV. ROBERT W.
